Job Description: Job DescriptionWe are looking for Angular Developers to join our fun, energetic team who are running at full speed to ignite a digital disruption in the movie industryRoles & ResponsibilitiesWork as part of a team developing applications and services using Agile development methodsOptimize for high-performance on both mobile and webWriting and deploying clean and documented codes on Angular v2 and above, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3Thorough understanding of the responsibilities of the platform, database, API, caching layer, proxies, and other web services used in the systemWriting non-blocking code, and resorting to advanced techniques such as multi-threading, when neededArchitecting and automating the build process for production, using task runners or scriptsWriting extensive unit tests using automated TDD tasksEligibilityMust Haves: Algorithms, Data Structure, Angular Js, JavascriptDevelopment experience designing object oriented JavaScript and SVGApplicable knowledge of web libraries and frameworks such as AngularJS, Polymer, and ClosureSolid knowledge in JavaScript is a mustFamiliarity with GIT for version controlAware of any Object Oriented JavaScript Frameworks (Backbone, Ember).R
